name: fusion-cardano-monorepo
description: Monorepo with Aiken, Foundry, Vite+Preact, and Hono packages

scripts.build: pnpm --filter=@1inch/cross-chain-sdk build && pnpm --filter=@fusion-cardano/shared build && pnpm --filter=@fusion/server build && pnpm --filter=@fusion/frontend build
scripts.clean:all: pnpm -r clean && rm -rf node_modules && pnpm install
